### Transcribing DNA

Function ```transcribe()``` takes a DNA fragment as the argument outputs a transcribed RNA version,   
with Thymine replaced with Uracil.

```{r}
fragment <- "TAGTATGAGA"

transcribe(DNA = fragment)
```
